column1: S0181.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0181.DECK.  181. SURVEY NUMBER
S0181.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0181.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. TOP THREE GRADER 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  1. UNDER 20 YEARS 2. 20 TO 24 3. 25 TO 29 4. 30 TO 34 5. 35 TO 37 6. 38 OR OVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q4. ARE YOU:  1. SINGLE 2. MARRIED, LIVING WITH WIFE ON OR NEAR POST 3. MARRIED, WIFE NOT LIVING NEAR POST 4. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 5. WIDOWED 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q5. HOW LONG HAVE YOU SERVED IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN, GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 4. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 5. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 6. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT THIS POS?  1. 1 MONTH OR LESS 2. OVER 1 MONTH UP TO 3 MONTHS 3. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 4. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 7 NOT CODED.
S0181.Q8. HAVE YOU SERVED OVERSEAS IN THIS WA?  1. YES, IN MY PRESENT BRANCH OF SERVICE 2. YES, BUT IN A DIFFERENT BRANCH OF SERVICE 3. NO, I HAVE NOT SERVED OVERSEAS IN THIS WAR 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q9. WHAT IS YOUR STATUS IN YOUR PRESENT COMPANY OR DETACHMEN?  1. I AM ASSIGNED 2. I AM ATTACHED UNASSIGNED 3. I AM A CASUAL 4. I DON'T KNOW MY STATUS 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q10. IF YOU HAD YOUR CHOICE, WOULD YOU RATHER BE STATIONED AT THIS POST OR AT THE ONE IN THIS COUNTRY WHERE YOU WERE LAST REGULARLY STATIONED BEFORE COMING HER?  1. I WOULD RATHER BE STATIONED HERE 2. I WOULD RATHER BE AT THE PLACE I WAS LAST STATIONED 3. I HAVE NEVER BEEN STATIONED AT ANY OTHER CAMP 4. IT WOULD MAKE NO DIFFERENCE 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q11. DO YOU HAVE TROUBLE FINDING INTERESTING THINGS TO DO IN YOUR OFF-DUTY FREE TIM?  1. MOST OF THE TIME 2. MUCH OF THE TIME 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q12. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN YOUR FAIR SHARE OF FURLOUGHS AND PASSE?  1. YES, I HAVE HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF BOTH FURLOUGHS AND PASSES 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF EITHER FURLOUGHS OR PASSES 3. I HAVE HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF FURLOUGHS, BUT NOT OF PASSES 4. I HAVE HAD MY FAIR SHARE OF PASSES, BUT NOT OF FURLOUGHS 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q13. DOES YOUR OUTFIT HAVE A REGULAR SYSTEM OF PASSES AND FURLOUGHS SO THAT EACH MAN GETS HIS EQUAL SHARE OF WHATEVER PASSES OR FURLOUGHS ARE AVAILABL?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q14A. SERVICE CLU?  1. GOOD 2. FAIR 3. BAD 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q14B. POST EXCHANG?  1. GOOD 2. FAIR 3. BAD 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q14C. BUS SERVICE TO TOW?  1. GOOD 2. FAIR 3. BAD 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q14D. LAUNDRY SERVIC?  1. GOOD 2. FAIR 3. BAD 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q14E. MOVIE FACILITIES AT THE POS?  1. GOOD 2. FAIR 3. BAD 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q15. HOW ARE YOU TREATED IN THE CITY OR TOWN NEAR THIS POS?  1. VERY WELL 2. FAIRLY WELL 3. RATHER BADLY 4. VERY BADLY 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q16. WHAT KIND OF LIVING FACILITIES ARE THERE FOR ENLISTED MEN TO LIVE WITH THEIR WIVES WHILE STATIONED AT THIS POS?  1. VERY GOOD 2. PRETTY GOOD 3. VERY POOR 4. PRETTY POOR 5. I DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q17. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARMY RULES AND REGULATIONS ON THIS POS?  1. ALL ARE NECESSARY 2. SOME ARE NOT NECESSARY 3. A LOT ARE NOT NECESSARY 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q18. WHAT WOULD YOU SAY ABOUT COMPANY PUNISHMENT IN YOUR OUTFI?  1. USUALLY FAIR 2. SOMETIMES FAIR AND SOMETIMES UNFAIR 3. USUALLY UNFAIR 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q19. HAVE YOU EVER RECEIVED COMPANY PUNISHMENT IN YOUR PRESENT OUTFI?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q20. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR PRESENT ARMY JO?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q21. WOULD YOU CHANGE TO SOME OTHER ARMY JOB IF GIVEN A CHANC?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q22. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q23. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARM?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT'S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q24. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSE?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q25. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY OR DETACHMEN?  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q26. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY OR DETACHMEN?  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q27. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JO?  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q28. IN GENERAL, WOULD YOU SAY THAT YOUR PRESENT COMPANY OR DETACHMENT HAS GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL IN THE ARM?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS IT HAS 2. IN SOME WAYS YES, IN OTHER WAYS NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE IT HAS NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 4. I HAVEN'T BEEN IN THIS OUTFIT LONG ENOUGH TO KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q29. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARM?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS YES, IN OTHER WAYS NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVEN'T GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q30. DO YOU USUALLY FEEL THAT WHAT YOU ARE DOING IN THE ARMY IS WORTHWHILE OR NO?  1. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS WORTHWHILE 2. I USUALLY FEEL IT IS NOT WORTHWHILE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q31. CONSIDERING THE PRESENT STAGE OF THE WAR, DO YOU THINK YOU SHOULD BE DISCHARGED NO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q32. COMPARED WITH OTHER ARMY MESSES, HOW DOES YOUR MESS RAT?  1. BETTER THAN MOST 2. ABOUT AVERAGE 3. POORER THAN MOST 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q33. WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ONCE-A-WEEK ARMY ORIENTATION HOU?  1. I LIKE IT VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT SOME 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE IT VERY MUCH 5. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q34. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THAT THE ENLISTED MEN IN YOUR PRESENT COMPANY OR DETACHMENT GET A SQUARE DEAL FROM THEIR OFFICE?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS THEY DO 2. IN SOME WAYS YES, IN OTHER WAYS NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE THEY DO NOT GET A SQUARE DEAL 4. I HAVEN'T BEEN IN THIS OUTFIT LONG ENOUGH TO KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q35. HOW DO YOU THINK THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT ARE SELECTED FOR PROMOTIO?  1. BECAUSE OF ABILITY 2. BOOTLICKING OR PLAYING POLITICS 3. PLAIN LUCK 4. BEEN IN THE ARMY A LONG TIME 5. OTHER 0. NO ANSWER P. THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS REFER TO OFFICERS IN CHARGE OF YOUR DAILY WORK.
S0181.Q36. HOW SUCCESSFUL ARE YOUR OFFICERS IN GETTING WILLING AND WHOLEHEARTED COOPERATION FROM THE ME?  1. VERY SUCCESSFUL 2. FAIRLY SUCCESSFUL 3. NOT VERY SUCCESSFUL 4. UNSUCCESSFUL 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q37. DO YOU FEEL YOUR OFFICERS KNOW WHAT YOUR ABILITIES ARE AND WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO D?  1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA 2. THEY HAVE A FAIR IDEA 3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT MY ABILITIES 0. NO ANSWER
S0181.Q38. WHEN YOU DO A PARTICULARLY GOOD JOB DO YOU USUALLY GET RECOGNITION OR PRAISE FOR I?  1. ALWAYS 2. USUALLY 3. RARELY 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0181.Q39. DO YOUR OFFICERS GIVE YOU A GOOD CHANCE TO ASK QUESTIONS AS TO THE REASONS WHY THINGS ARE DONE THE WAY THEY AR?  1. YES, ALWAYS 2. YES, USUALLY 3. NO, NOT VERY OFTEN 4. NO, ALMOST NEVER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 40 NOT ASKED AT FT. BENNING.

S0181.Q40. DO YOU THINK SOLDIERS SHOULD BE USED FOR MOST OF THE WORK NOW DONE BY CIVILIANS ON THE POS?  1. SOLDIERS SHOULD BE USED FOR MOST JOBS NOW DONE BY CIVILIANS ON THE POST 2. CIVILIANS SHOULD BE USED FOR AS MANY JOBS AS POSSIBLE ON THE POST 3. IT DOESN'T MAKE MUCH DIFFERENCE 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE (FT. BENNING)
